import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Form,Button,Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' function LoginScreen() { const [email, setEmail]=useState('') const [password, setPassword]=useState('') return (

SIGN IN

EMAIL ADDRESS setEmail(e.target.value)} > PASSWORD setpassword(e.target.value)} >
) } export default LoginScreen
